TEXT.TITLE: FIRST UNION <FUNC> FILES 100 MLN DLR NOTES ISSUE
TEXT.BODY: First Union Corp said it has filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a proposed offering of 100 mln dlrs of fixed rate subordinated notes due 1997. The notes will be sold nationwide through underwriters managed by Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc. Reuter
